pros: Thorough and respectful communication among management and employees. Ability to understand how things work after you become a part of the SUNY Buffalo team.  There is always a person available within SUNY Buffalo to help you answer questions about being a new employee.  Passionate faculty members and interview process with multiple people in the department.  Gives the employee a good understanding of how serious and professional faculty are at the home campus.
cons: I do not have any Cons as of now.  Teaching is an interesting and empowering journey and I feel that people going into academia understand the respective rewards and challenges.
